verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In a hidden valley, just over a hill,
A young shepherd boy
Surrenders his will.
As he lifts his voice in praise to his King,
Only the lambs will hear,
And follow as he sings.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hidden valleys produce a life's song.
Hidden valleys will make your heart strong.
Desperation can cause you to sing.
Hidden valleys turn shepherds to kings.
